WITH opening AS ( SELECT item_code, item_name, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN SUM(COALESCE(quantity, 0)) END AS debit, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN SUM(COALESCE(quantity, 0)) END AS credit, unit_code, store_name FROM inventory.checkout_detail_view JOIN finance.transaction_master ON checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id = transaction_master.transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId::int AND transaction_master.value_date <= @From::date AND (COALESCE(@StoreId::int, 0) = 0 OR checkout_detail_view.store_id = @StoreId::int) GROUP BY item_code, item_name, unit_code, transaction_type, store_name ), closing AS ( SELECT item_code, item_name, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN SUM(COALESCE(quantity, 0)) END AS debit, CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'Cr' THEN SUM(COALESCE(quantity, 0)) END AS credit, unit_code, store_name FROM inventory.checkout_detail_view JOIN finance.transaction_master ON checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id = transaction_master.transaction_master_id WHERE transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId::int AND transaction_master.value_date <= @To::date AND (COALESCE(@StoreId::int, 0) = 0 OR checkout_detail_view.store_id = @StoreId::int) GROUP BY item_code, item_name, unit_code, transaction_type, store_name ), total AS ( SELECT opening.store_name, opening.item_code, opening.item_name, SUM(COALESCE(opening.debit, 0)) - SUM(COALESCE(opening.credit, 0)) AS opening, null AS closing, opening.unit_code FROM opening GROUP BY opening.item_code, opening.item_name, opening.unit_code, opening.store_name UNION ALL
SELECT closing.store_name, closing.item_code, closing.item_name, null AS opening, SUM(COALESCE(closing.debit, 0)) - SUM(COALESCE(closing.credit, 0)) AS closing, closing.unit_code FROM closing GROUP BY closing.item_code, closing.item_name, closing.unit_code, closing.store_name ) SELECT store_name, item_code, item_name, SUM(COALESCE(opening, 0)) AS opening, CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(opening, 0))<SUM(COALESCE(closing, 0)) THEN SUM(COALESCE(closing, 0)) - SUM(COALESCE(opening, 0)) END AS increase, CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(opening, 0))>SUM(COALESCE(closing, 0)) THEN SUM(COALESCE(opening, 0)) - SUM(COALESCE(closing, 0)) END AS decrease, SUM(COALESCE(closing, 0)) AS closing, unit_code FROM total GROUP BY store_name, item_code, item_name, unit_code ORDER BY item_code;
